an2.112:1: "Bhikkhus, the taints increase for two (kinds of persons). What two?One who perceives what is not an offense as an offense and one who perceives what is an offense as no offense.[n.32] I translate based onCeand Ee. Be inverts the two clauses, reading:Yo ca āpattiyā anāpattisaññī, yo ca anāpattiyā āpattisaññī.The taints increase for these two (kinds of persons)."
